cohortName: [PL 4253901001] Juvenile rheumatoid arthritis referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4253901) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 4253901002] Juvenile rheumatoid arthritis referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4253901) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 4253901003] Chronic arthritis among pediatrics at first diagnosis (restricted to age less than 18)
logicDescription: Chronic arthritis at first diagnosis with persons limited to less than 18 years of age with 365 days continuous observation. Cohort exit is the end of continuous observable time for the person.

cohortName: [PL 4253901004] Juvenile Idiopathic arthritis at first diagnosis
logicDescription: Juvenile idiopathic arthritis at first diagnosis with 365 days continuous observation. Cohort exit is the end of continuous observable time for the person.
